item.title: Rapid access to health data in the UK
item.description: In the field of public health, there is a need to access health and healthcare-related data much faster than ever before. A pertinent example of this is the current coronavirus outbreak (COVID-19). In early February 2020, merely days after the first cases were confirmed in the UK, the Department of Health and Social Care along with UK Research & Innovation announced a Â£20M investment to facilitate rapid research on the virus by world-class UK academic and industry experts1.
